body_html:
I thought I fixed everything (not merged to master yet), where I realized that any py_test or py_binary rule outputs get /usr/bin/env python by bazel.
So this is blocked by a bazel bug.
I am contacting bazel team to see how we can fix this.

I thought I fixed everything (not merged to master yet), where I realized that any py_test or py_binary rule outputs get /usr/bin/env python by bazel.

body:
I thought I fixed everything (not merged to master yet), where I realized that any `py_test` or `py_binary` rule outputs get `/usr/bin/env python` by bazel.
So this is blocked by a bazel bug.
I am contacting bazel team to see how we can fix this.
